Package org.appkit.widget.util

various utilities for working with standard SWT widgets

Class Summary
ButtonUtils Various functions for working with Buttons
GridLayoutUtils Various functions for working with GridLayouts
SashFormUtils Various functions for working with SashForms
ShellUtils Various functions for working with Shells
SWTUtils Various utility-functions.
TableUtils Various functions for working with Tables
TreeUtils Various functions for working with Trees
